title: cultural_data_Simeone_Automotive_Museum
text:
﻿App Link on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mytoursapp.android.simeone.
Application Name: Simeone Automotive Museum.
Number of Reviews: 7.00.
Application Description: The Simeone Foundation Automotive Museum is one of the world's greatest collections of racing sports cars. Assembled by Dr. Frederick Simeone over a span of 50 years, the Museum contains over 65 of the rarest and most significant racing sports cars ever built. The Simeone was chosen ‘Museum of the Year’ by the International Historic Motoring Awards in London.Read moreCollapse.
